results.title: Our lighthouse adventure
results.creator_credit: Lisa Kebbell and Queenscliff Primary School
results.brief_description:
Created as part of an investigation into the lighthouses of Queenscliff. The Queenscliff Primary School students wanted to write an adventure story in which they were the stars. It was also a way in which they could convey some of the information they had learnt about lighthouses to an audience in an entertaining way.
A photomontage accompanied by commentary from the students on CD ROM.
results.description:

A photomontage accompanied by commentary from the students on CD ROM.

results.title: Birchip School: growing up in the Mallee
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: Students talk about what it is like to grow up in a small rural town, discuss the pros and cons, and the impact that issues like the drought have had on their own lives.
